features.name: False Appearance
features.description: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
